A three-of-a-kind scores 30 base chips with 3x multiplier, which gives me 90 chips before joker effects.

If I instead play the Jack of Hearts first, it triggers both Hanging Chad and Photograph for X2 Mult, but then I'd need to add the Aces to form the three-of-a-kind hand. The scoring would depend on which cards actually count toward the hand type and which ones just add chip values.

Let me focus on a simpler approach with just a Pair of Aces.
